= [[size 150%]]{{**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6780 SCP-6780]** - 'helth by dado' Brought to You by Vikander-Kneed}}[[/size]]
------
= //(Written by [[user Grigori Karpin]] and [[user Ihp]], and drawn by [[user winkwonkboi]].)//
@@ @@
[[div class="note"]]
[[=]]
**__Artist's Commentary__**

Ah, yes. Vikander-Kneed. I was wondering when I would be drawing an art piece on them.

Let me say this right off the bat: I enjoy reading VKTM articles. The combination of batshit hijinks and disturbing playoffs is very entertaining, and I really do think more authors should take the chance to read some of them. I especially like the images that accompany the articles. Really gets you immersed into the world of VKTM, though that could probably apply to any other story with artistic depictions.

And yup, this is another digital drawing. Freaking beautiful, I know. I gotta say, it's been some time since I drew something for the wiki, orâ€¦ at all, really. I haven't had the chance to doodle and I quite honestly miss spending hours of my time creating pieces like these. I'm glad I can share them to other people, too. 

With that said, though, I'll be returning to my drawing tablet. Peace for now.
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
[[=]]
+ //For A Better Tomorrow!//
Check out my other 'doodles' [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/winkwonk-doodles here.]
